Vincent Pastore https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Pastore 0 Vincent Pastore (born July 14, 1946) is an American actor. Often cast as a mafioso, he is best known for his portrayal of Salvatore "Big Pussy" Bonpensiero on the HBO series The Sopranos. Vincent_Pastore ( born July_14_,_1946 ) is an_American_actor . Often cast as a_mafioso , he is_best_known for his_portrayal of Salvatore_"_Big_Pussy_"_Bonpensiero on the_HBO_series The_Sopranos .
